tasks.label: Flash Master (j-link)
args: ((echo r & echo h & echo loadfile debug/${workspaceFolderBasename}.hex & echo q) > flash.jlink) && (JLink.exe -device ${config:device} -if SWD -speed 4000 -NoGui 1 -USB Master -CommandFile flash.jlink)

tasks.label: Flash Slave (j-link)
args: ((echo r & echo h & echo loadfile debug/${workspaceFolderBasename}.hex & echo q) > flash.jlink) && (JLink.exe -device ${config:device} -if SWD -speed 4000 -NoGui 1 -USB Slave -CommandFile flash.jlink)

tasks.label: Flash Master & Slave (j-link)
args: ((echo device ${config:device} & echo si SWD & echo speed 4000 & echo r & echo h & echo loadfile debug/${workspaceFolderBasename}.hex & echo q) > flash.jlink) && (for %n in (Master,Slave) do JLink.exe -NoGui 1 -USB %n -CommandFile flash.jlink)
